name: Climate Countdown
description:
The game "Climate Countdown" is about saving the world from environmental pollution and it is your job to revert the effects of climate change.

In this top-down 2D game you have to complete given tasks that have a positive effect on the world's climate, such as planting trees and climate neutral energy resources.

You have to quickly react to minor or major climate disasters and you can command your workers to help you accomplish those tasks. The current rate of pollution can be seen in the progress bar.

Climate Countdown is a race against time and pollution, but with good management you can save the world and make it a better place for future generations.
